name: Jalapeño Chicken
ingredients: 7 ounce can whole pickled jalapeños (6 peppers)

instructions.en: Season the chicken breasts with the taco seasoning.
Grill or pan fry the chicken until done.
Place the cooked chicken on a baking sheet.
Slit the jalapeños lengthwise, open flat, and scrape out the seeds and membranes.
Arrange 2 prepared jalapeños on top of each chicken breast.
Cover the jalapeños on each breast with a slice of Monterey jack cheese.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for about 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.

notes: This recipe makes 3 servings. Do not freeze.
